subject: Re: [junit] JUnit Test coverage - Statement complete
msgSnippet: It s not free, but I have used JProbe, which has the kind of coverage analysis you re looking for. -- Ted ... From: shmaytan To: junit@yahoogroups.com Sent:
messageBody:
It's not free, but I have used JProbe, which has the kind of coverage analysis you're looking for.

-- Ted
----- Original Message -----
From: shmaytan
To: junit@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Monday, September 09, 2002 5:06 PM
Subject: [junit] JUnit Test coverage - Statement complete


Hi!

I have a bunch of white-box Junit tests and I would like to check if I
have executed every line of code with the tests. Not just every
method, but every line of code within the method.

Does anyone know of a good tool (hopefully free...) that works on Linux???

Thanks,
-Eytan
